title: Count Substring Occurrences
description:
DWORD_OF_BYTE creates from 4 individual bytes (B0 .. B3) a DWORD.
A DWORD is composed as follows: B3-B2-B1-B0.
name: COUNT_SUBSTRING

input.name: SEARCH
input.description: The substring to search for within the main string.

input.name: STR
input.description: The main string in which substring occurrences will be counted.

return_value.description: The total number of occurrences of the substring within the main string.
